column1: '''Soundestiny''' is a Neo-celtic Folk Rock band based in [[wikipedia:Brisbane|Brisbane
column2: Australia]]. They have produced two albums (2004
column3: 2010) featuring music inspired by ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. The 25 original songs from these two albums together form their "RingLord saga" - a Rock musical inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. They have also released an EP (2009) and a full album (2012) containing music inspired by ''[[The Hobbit]]''.

column1: From time to time other artists have recorded with the band. These include Clyde Schipke (guitars)
